message: Let's start with a simple offer: 60/40. I believe this is a fair starting point.
I think 60/40 is a bit biased, how about we try 55/45?
I understand your point about fairness, so let's switch it around. I'll take 55/45 this time.
Let's try to find a middle ground. I'll take a bit less than last time, but still more than you offered.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to meet closer to the middle. How about 51/49? We're losing money with every round!
We're getting close! I'll take a tiny bit more than half, considering the money's value is dropping fast.
